full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYABS 'GRO SEMS BSKYED KYI NYAMS LEN GSAL BYED LEGS TSOGS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A* , ,CES MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM THAMS CAD KYI GZHI RTEN KHO NAR GYUR BA SKYABS 'GRO SEMS BSKYED KYI NYAMS LEN GSAL BYED LEGS TSOGS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, GZHUNG LUGS DUM LA BLO MIG YANGS PA GU SHRI BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG, DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO GNYI KYIS SNGA PHIR NAN TAN DU BSKUL ZHING, BLO DMAN GZHAN DAG LA'AN PHAN RE'I BSAM PAS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE, MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I BLA MA DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA'I BTZUN GZUGS SNYOM LAS PA ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN RGYUD PA RDO RJE SLOB DPON PA DHA RMA BIRYA SHR'IS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE NAM YANG MI NUB CING PHOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG,
